name: Think of the Children
description: Little Bobby’s dead, the BBQ is on fire, Jen’s eating poisonous berries and the birthday cake still needs icing. It’s just another wonderful day out with the kids in Think of the Children, a frantic co-operative parenting simulator.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 460 or Radeon® HD 5770, 1 GB of memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
